newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products steady to firmer.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products steady to firmer.

text.p: NWE oil products were steady to stronger on Friday.

Gasoline was steady. Arbitrage to the U.S. was closed, but up to 100,000 tonnes of demand was reported in eastern Europe for September. Naphtha was firm with refinery maintenance in Algeria and northern Europe and Brazilian demand keeping the market tight. Gas oil cargoes were stronger with balanced supply and demand and increasing interest in low sulphur material.
High sulphur fuel oil barges gained and then faltered as buying interest evaporated. Cargoes were steady, but thin.
